item.title: Elon Musk: New version of Tesla Autopilot mind-blowing
item.description:
Elon Musk: New version of Tesla Autopilot mind-blowing

Despite federal investigations into a fatal Florida crash, Tesla CEO Elon Musk this week professed his deep faith in the rapid adoption of fully autonomous driving. Musk told investors Tesla was making significant strides in honing its Autopilot driver-assist system.

item.title: Nasa's secret art studio: how to make rocket science beautiful
item.description:
Nasa's secret art studio: how to make rocket science beautiful

If you've marveled at space news recently, there's a good chance it's thanks to the Jet Propulsion Laboratory. This arm of Nasa is responsible for the most ambitious of missions, like sending robots to Mars and, most recently, the Juno spacecraft to Jupiter.

item.title: No title
Flight plan reproductions to put a touch of Apollo 11 on your coffee table
item.description:
Flight plan reproductions to put a touch of Apollo 11 on your coffee table

It's not easy - or cheap - to get your hands on authentic Apollo 11 memorabilia.

item.title: Assignment of a Lifetime: Riding in a U-2 Spy Plane at the Edge of Space
item.description:
Assignment of a Lifetime: Riding in a U-2 Spy Plane at the Edge of Space

Back in 2010, San Francisco-based photographer Christopher Michel received a once-in-a-lifetime photo assignment from the US Navel Institute: to ride in the back seat of a U-2 spy plane at the "edge of space." At the plane's cruising and intelligence-gathering altitude of 70,000 feet above the ground, temperatures outside the plane fall to 70 degrees below zero.

item.title: A Beautiful Speedometer for Bikes
item.description:
A Beautiful Speedometer for Bikes

Shout-out to designers who are also obsessed with cycling because their work frequently results in something new and clever, like the arresting Omata One. Mounted onto a bike, the speedometer's unique analog face informs of the four most relevant ride metrics (speed, distance, ascent and time).

item.title: My Perfect 24 Hours, If I Were a Teleporting Billionaire | Travel Away
item.description:
My Perfect 24 Hours, If I Were a Teleporting Billionaire | Travel Away

Bear with me on this one. Let's say it's summer, end of August to be more precise. I live in Romania, I am a billionaire, and, of course, teleportation is possible. To make it easier for you to calculate (if you want to), use the Eastern European time (UTC+2).

item.title: New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you
item.description:
New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you

Up until now, we've really only seen SpaceX's rocket landing in the middle of the ocean from afar. Chase planes near the drone ship provided a spectacular view of the milestone event, but now, S...
